meanings.definition: The quality or state of being manful; manliness.
meanings.sent1: His manfulness was evident in the way he stood up for his beliefs.
meanings.sent2: She admired his manfulness and strength of character.
meanings.sent3: Despite his small size, his manfulness shone through in times of adversity.
meanings.sent4: The man's manfulness was like a beacon of light in the darkness of despair.
meanings.sent5: The story of his manfulness spread throughout the town, inspiring others.

meanings.definition: The act of being brave or courageous; valor.
meanings.sent1: Her manfulness in facing her fears was truly admirable.
meanings.sent2: The soldier's manfulness on the battlefield earned him respect from his comrades.
meanings.sent3: The cat showed unexpected manfulness when confronted by a dog twice its size.
meanings.sent4: His manfulness in standing up to the bully was a sight to behold.
meanings.sent5: The man's manfulness in rescuing the child from the burning building was heroic.

meanings.definition: The characteristic of being strong and resolute; fortitude.
meanings.sent1: In the face of adversity, her manfulness never wavered.
meanings.sent2: The mountain climber's manfulness helped him reach the summit against all odds.
meanings.sent3: The man's manfulness in sticking to his principles was unwavering.
meanings.sent4: Her manfulness in overcoming obstacles inspired those around her.
meanings.sent5: The knight's manfulness in battle was unmatched, earning him the title of champion.
